name: J.P. Murphy Playground Park
description: Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Parking - Accessible Restroom - Community Room(s) - Outdoor Basketball Court - Playground - Restrooms - Tennis This playground has a play structure, three tennis courts, and a basketball court.
